languages.text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Голос Мастера вокса дрожит от усталости.{/n} "Ситуация на корабле стабилизирована... в некоторой степени. На полное устранение последствий атаки уйдет время, но корабль все еще способен перемещаться. Возможно, мы даже готовы к варп-прыжку, если вы желаете покинуть эту систему. Позвольте ввести вас в курс дела".

"Lord Captain!" {n}The Vox Master's voice is quivering with exhaustion.{/n} "The situation has been brought under control... more or less. It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Голос Мастера вокса дрожит от усталости.{/n} "Ситуация на корабле стабилизирована... в некоторой степени. На полное устранение последствий атаки уйдет время, но корабль все еще способен перемещаться. Возможно, мы даже готовы к варп-прыжку, если вы желаете покинуть эту систему. Позвольте ввести вас в курс дела".

It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a Warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."

Allow me to bring you up to date."

It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."

languages.text: “舰长大人！”{n}音阵大师的声音颤抖着，听起来很疲惫。{/n}“情况已经得到了控制……基本算是吧。想要从袭击中完全恢复还要花些时间，但这艘船目前已经能开得起来了。如果您认为我们应该离开这个星系，我们也可以进行亚空间跳跃。请允许我向您介绍一下目前的情况吧。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Vox Master's voice is quivering with exhaustion.{/n} "The situation has been brought under control... more or less. It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！”{n}音阵大师的声音颤抖着，听起来很疲惫。{/n}“情况已经得到了控制……基本算是吧。想要从袭击中完全恢复还要花些时间，但这艘船目前已经能开得起来了。如果您认为我们应该离开这个星系，我们也可以进行亚空间跳跃。请允许我向您介绍一下目前的情况吧。”

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán!». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos tiembla por el cansancio.{/n} «Hemos controlado la situación... más o menos. Tardaremos un tiempo en eliminar completamente las consecuencias del ataque, pero la nave puede moverse. Hasta podemos ejecutar un salto de disformidad si cree que deberíamos abandonar el sistema. Permítame que le ponga al día».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Vox Master's voice is quivering with exhaustion.{/n} "The situation has been brought under control... more or less. It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán!». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos tiembla por el cansancio.{/n} «Hemos controlado la situación... más o menos. Tardaremos un tiempo en eliminar completamente las consecuencias del ataque, pero la nave puede moverse. Hasta podemos ejecutar un salto de disformidad si cree que deberíamos abandonar el sistema. Permítame que le ponga al día».

languages.text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Die Stimme des Vox-Masters zittert vor Erschöpfung.{/n} "Die Situation ist unter Kontrolle gebracht worden ... mehr oder weniger. Es wird einige Zeit dauern, die Folgen des Angriffs vollständig zu beseitigen, aber das Schiff ist in der Lage, sich zu bewegen. Vielleicht können wir sogar einen Warpsprung durchführen, wenn Sie meinen, wir sollten das System verlassen. Erlauben Sie mir, Sie auf den neuesten Stand zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Vox Master's voice is quivering with exhaustion.{/n} "The situation has been brought under control... more or less. It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Vox Master's voice is quivering with exhaustion.{/n} "The situation has been brought under control... more or less. It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox tremble d'épuisement.{/n} « Nous avons repris le contrôle de la situation... Enfin, plus ou moins. Il faudra un certain temps pour effacer totalement les conséquences de l'attaque, mais le vaisseau est de nouveau capable de se déplacer. Nous devrions même pouvoir effectuer un saut Warp si vous estimez qu'il est temps de quitter le système. Permettez-moi de vous donner de plus amples détails. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Vox Master's voice is quivering with exhaustion.{/n} "The situation has been brought under control... more or less. It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox tremble d'épuisement.{/n} « Nous avons repris le contrôle de la situation... Enfin, plus ou moins. Il faudra un certain temps pour effacer totalement les conséquences de l'attaque, mais le vaisseau est de nouveau capable de se déplacer. Nous devrions même pouvoir effectuer un saut Warp si vous estimez qu'il est temps de quitter le système. Permettez-moi de vous donner de plus amples détails. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は疲れから震えている。{/n}「状況は収束しました…大体は、ですが。攻撃の影響を全て払拭するにはしばらく時間がかかりますが、船は移動できます。星系を離れる必要性を感じているようであれば、ワープジャンプも実行できそうです。最新情報を伝えさせてください」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Vox Master's voice is quivering with exhaustion.{/n} "The situation has been brought under control... more or less. It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は疲れから震えている。{/n}「状況は収束しました…大体は、ですが。攻撃の影響を全て払拭するにはしばらく時間がかかりますが、船は移動できます。星系を離れる必要性を感じているようであれば、ワープジャンプも実行できそうです。最新情報を伝えさせてください」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan!" {n}Voks Üstadı'nın sesi bitkinlikten titriyor.{/n} "Problem kontrol altına alındı... Sayılır. Saldırıya neden olan durumları tamamen elemine etmek zaman alacak ancak gemi harekete geçmeye hazır. Sistemden ayrılmamız gerektiğini düşünüyorsanız bir öte sıçrama bile yapabilecek durumdayız. Müsaadenizle güncel bilgileri sizinle paylaşayım."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The Vox Master's voice is quivering with exhaustion.{/n} "The situation has been brought under control... more or less. It will take some time to eliminate the consequences of the attack completely, but the vessel is capable of motion. We may even be able to conduct a warp jump if you feel we should leave the system. Allow me to bring you up to date."
